'''Guildmaster Mairu''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A guildmaster in fine robes stares down the sizable, blue-skinned aumaua before her.

Students observe the exchange in a loose circle, exchanging whispers.}}
Guildmaster Mairu is an elder member of the guild and one most concerned about politics and propriety regarding its position among the [Huana](/huana/). As such, she is perpetually at odds with [Tekēhu](/tekehu/), the proud and cocksure godlike.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Shadow Under Neketaka](/theShadowUnderNeketaka/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Shadow Under Neketaka](/theShadowUnderNeketaka/): Mairu is responsible for the defense of the guild against the Naga invasion.
[Category:Periki's Overlook characters](/categoryPerikisOverlookCharacters/)

==Background==
{{Description|A guildmaster in fine robes stares down the sizable, blue-skinned aumaua before her.

Students observe the exchange in a loose circle, exchanging whispers.}}
Guildmaster Mairu is an elder member of the guild and one most concerned about politics and propriety regarding its position among the [[Huana]]. As such, she is perpetually at odds with [[Tekēhu]], the proud and cocksure godlike.
